data.prayer: Lord of the Harvest, please send out workers into the the state of Kapchorwa, Uganda.
data.verse: Then he said to his disciples, “The harvest is plentiful but the workers are few. Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Kapchorwa, Uganda
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, you desire the people in the state of Kapchorwa who are far from you to hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.prayer: Father, you have chosen the weak things of this world to confound the strong. Make the poor and outcast in the state of Kapchorwa a testimony of your strength.
data.verse: God chose the foolish things of the world that he might put to shame those who are wise. God chose the weak things of the world, that he might put to shame the things that are strong;

data.prayer: Father, your Word is essential for life and growth. Please challenge the 5,643 cultural Christians in the state of Kapchorwa to read your Word for themselves today.
data.verse: It is written: 'Man shall not live by bread alone, but by every word that comes from the mouth of God.'

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the Hindi people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Hindi people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Hindi people is yours.
Father, let love abound more and more in the church of Kapchorwa, Uganda.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight

data.prayer: Good Shepherd, thank you that you know the name of each of the 3,746 believers in Kapchorwa.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd; I know my sheep and my sheep know me

data.section_summary:
the state of Kapchorwa, Uganda has a population of 11,300.

We estimate Kapchorwa has 3,746 people who might know Jesus, 5,643 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,911 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 3 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, be a refuge and strength for the hurting in Kapchorwa, Uganda today.
data.verse: God is our refuge and strength, an ever-present help in trouble.

location.name: Kapchorwa
location.people_groups_list: Kalenjin, Pokot, Plains Bira, Nubian, Gujarati, Meneng
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Kalenjin, Pokot (134,000), Plains Bira (2,000), Nubian (37,000), Gujarati (465,000), Meneng (7,800)
